scripts.start: npm run web:start && npm run db:start
scripts.stop: npm run web:stop && npm run db:stop
scripts.reset: npm run web:reset && npm run db:reset
scripts.clean:install: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd api && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd ../web && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd ..
scripts.db:start: cd database && docker compose up -d && cd ..
scripts.db:stop: cd database && docker compose down && cd ..
scripts.db:clean: cd database && docker compose down --rmi all && cd ..
scripts.db:reset: cd database && docker compose down --rmi all -v && cd ..
